description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. In Dual Zone you control two spaceships inside a coliseum where each team-mate has to defend the other one. It also features Cooperative gameplay, with two players, each one controlling one spaceship. With a Campaign mode with 50 levels full of enemies, Dual Zone also features a "Panic" mode with unlimited gameplay time. Try to win all the Awards!
